name: RetrieveWebExperiment
description:
Retrieve details of a specific web experiment.

This tool is used to retrieve detailed information about a specific web experiment from a project. It should be called when you need to access data related to a web experiment identified by its ID within a project. Each call will log a new view of the experiment.

parameters.name: web_experiment_id
parameters.description: A unique integer identifying the web experiment to retrieve details for.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this web experiment.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Call /api/projects/ to retrieve the ID.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this web experiment.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this web experiment.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
